name: @stekoe/ocl.js
description: Object Constraint Language parser written in JavaScript.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run test && npx tsc
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:examples:node.js && npm run build:examples:typescript
scripts.build:examples:node.js: cd examples/node.js && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:examples:typescript: cd examples/ts && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:examples
scripts.prepare:release: npx cross-env RUN_SLOW_TESTS=true npm run build && npm run build:examples
scripts.test: npm run generate:parser && npm run test:fast
scripts.test:coverage: npx rimraf -- coverage && nyc ts-mocha 'test/**/*.spec.ts' && npx rimraf -- .nyc_output
